addQuickLinkText.description: Button or label for adding a new quick link on the start page

settingsHeader.description: Main header for the settings section

engineSettings.description: Label for the section where the user can configure the default search engine

chosseEngine.description: Prompt or label instructing the user to select a preferred search engine

vanishAnimation.description: Option to enable or configure an animation effect for disappearing elements

backgroundSettings.description: Header for settings related to the application's background

chooseBackground.description: Prompt or label for selecting a background image or color

quickLinkSection.description: Header for the section displaying quick access links

chooseQuickLinkType.message: Choisir le type de lien rapide
chooseQuickLinkType.description: Instruction for selecting the type or category of a quick link

restart.description: Header or label for restart-related settings or action

deleteQuickLinks.description: Option or button to remove all quick links from the interface

bigQuickLink.description: Label or toggle for enabling larger-sized quick link icons

restoreToDefaultSettings.description: Button or action to reset all user settings to the default configuration

weatherWidget.description: Header or label related to weather features in the app

weatherWidgetSettingsText.description: Toggle or option to show the weather widget on the interface

disable.description: Generic action button or label to turn off a feature

enable.description: Generic action button or label to turn on a feature

delete.description: Generic action to remove an item

reset.description: Generic action to restore values or states to a previous or default condition

save.description: Action button to confirm and save changes

address.description: Field label for entering a URL or physical address

name.description: Field label for entering a name or title

close.description: Action to close a dialog, modal, or window

transparent.description: Option or label referring to transparency settings
